name: Rhythmhero: Piano
description:
Enjoy the rhythm game with cute heroes!

▶ Game Features
- Simple operation! Touch the touch by timing
- Enjoy the rhythm game with hero and boss!
- Experience gorgeous skills filled with skill gauges!

▶ How to play
One stage takes place in the process of filling the Hp of the hero and in battle with the boss.
1. Fill hero's Hp while playing a rhythm game within a fixed time ~!
2. Fight with the boss filled Hp! Defeat boss with skill and general attack ~!
3. The higher you complete the stage, the more rewards ~ ~

Take a trip with heroes right now!
